mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, member_password, member_name, member_department, member_position, member_employmentdate, member_birth, member_email, verify_code, application_date, updated_at, employment_status, member_permission) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{member_password}, #{member_name}, #{member_department}, #{member_position}, #{member_employmentdate}, #{member_birth}, #{member_email}, #{verify_code}, NOW(), NOW(), #{employment_status}, #{member_permission})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
